entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clearwater
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:52 PM PST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Clearwater 03:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -13.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -19.1°C
Wind: WSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 17. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 7.
